subject: BGS
name: Bus and Society
fullname: Business and Society in the U.S. and World Economy
info: Insights into ethical constraints and imperatives, stakeholder management and role of government regulations and the public policy process in domestic and global operations; technology and legal aspects; knowledge and skills to deal with the conflicts faced domestically and globally by managers.

subject: BGS
name: Leadership & Ethics
info: Political/ethical aspects of management examined in terms of processes within organization and in terms of organization's relationships with other institutions. Skills to deal with issues such as careers, alliances, coalitions, and negotiations. Cases, group presentations, individual assignments.

subject: BGS
name: Msmt Theory & Meth.
fullname: Seminar: Theory and Methods of Measurement
info: Validity and reliability of measures developed as key indicators of constructs in a behavioral context. Methods for evaluating measures, such as indicators of reliability, Multi-Trait Multi-Method analysis, exploratory factor analysis, and confirmatory factor analysis using Lisrel.
